prerequisites.supportedUseCase: Shows sensitive data discovery findings from publicly accessible or unencrypted data stores, and use a formula to calculate the potential cost if based on the number of sensitive data records that could be exposed.

widgets.title: Potential cost of data breach in public-facing and unencrypted data stores

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find Finding with open!=false and hasSensitiveData=true and 
  numericSeverity>5 and extension!='js' and
  (public=true or encrypted!=true)
return sum(Finding.detectionsCount) * 142 as value

widgets.title: Sensitive data that may be publicly accessible or unencrypted

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find unique Finding with open!=false and hasSensitiveData=true 
  and numericSeverity>5 and extension!='js' and
  (public=true or encrypted!=true)
return 
  Finding._type, Finding.name, Finding.severity, Finding.file, Finding.path,
  Finding.PII, Finding.PCI, Finding.secret

widgets.title: Sensitive data records in public or unencrypted data stores

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find Finding with open!=false and hasSensitiveData=true and 
  numericSeverity>5 and extension!='js' and
  (public=true or encrypted!=true)
return sum(Finding.detectionsCount) as value
